data: PED Naloxone for Opioid Reversal - Inpatient (Module)
Medications
IV route preferred to IM route, if IV in place

* - For partial opioid reversal, give 0.1 mg IV naloxone.  
- For full opioid reversal, initial dose is 0.4 mg. If ineffective after two doses of 0.4 mg, try escalating doses of 2 mg, 4 mg, 10 mg
